flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Do you want to have a sub-machine airsoft gun?

This sub-machine airsoft gun is inexpensive. Make one yourself!
guide.introduction_rendered:
Do you want to have a sub-machine airsoft gun?

This sub-machine airsoft gun is inexpensive. Make one yourself!

lines.text: Materials/Tools
lines.text_raw: Materials/Tools

lines.text: 1=Bottle; 2=Heat-shrink tubing; 3=Adhesive tape; 4=Tube; 5=Long tube or casing from a felt-tip pen (the size of Airsoft's ball); 6=Butane lighter; 7=Saw; 8=Rubber or plastic hose; 9=Compressed-air blowgun; 10=Hot-glue gun.
lines.text_raw: 1=Bottle; 2=Heat-shrink tubing; 3=Adhesive tape; 4=Tube; 5=Long tube or casing from a felt-tip pen (the size of Airsoft's ball); 6=Butane lighter; 7=Saw; 8=Rubber or plastic hose; 9=Compressed-air blowgun; 10=Hot-glue gun.

lines.text: 11=Drill (not shown).
lines.text_raw: 11=Drill (not shown).

lines.text: First, drill a hole in the cap of the bottle.
lines.text_raw: First, drill a hole in the cap of the bottle.

lines.text: Glue the large tube to the cap.
lines.text_raw: Glue the large tube to the cap.

lines.text: When the glue has set, drill a hole in the end of the large tube and another hole in its side. Cut the smaller tube (to create the gun's barrel) to a length of 2 inches.
lines.text_raw: When the glue has set, drill a hole in the end of the large tube and another hole in its side. Cut the smaller tube (to create the gun's barrel) to a length of 2 inches.

lines.text: Glue the small tube to the hole in the end of the large tube.
lines.text_raw: Glue the small tube to the hole in the end of the large tube.

lines.text: Flare the end of the rubber hose with a suitable tool (pen, stick, china marker, felt-tip pen, etc.).
lines.text_raw: Flare the end of the rubber hose with a suitable tool (pen, stick, china marker, felt-tip pen, etc.).

lines.text: Cut the nozzle of the blowgun to 1 inch long.
lines.text_raw: Cut the nozzle of the blowgun to 1 inch long.

lines.text: Fit the hose over the nozzle.
lines.text_raw: Fit the hose over the nozzle.

lines.text: Glue the hose to the nozzle. When the glue has set, cut a piece of heat-shrink tubing 0.7 inches long and place it over the joint.
lines.text_raw: Glue the hose to the nozzle. When the glue has set, cut a piece of heat-shrink tubing 0.7 inches long and place it over the joint.

lines.text: Shrink the tubing using a butane lighter.
lines.text_raw: Shrink the tubing using a butane lighter.

lines.text: Wrap the end of the blowgun with adhesive tape to make the connection airtight.  Place the end of the rubber hose into the hole in the side of the tube and wrap that joint with adhesive tape also.
lines.text_raw: Wrap the end of the blowgun with adhesive tape to make the connection airtight.  Place the end of the rubber hose into the hole in the side of the tube and wrap that joint with adhesive tape also.

lines.text: Here is how the assembly should look at this point.
lines.text_raw: Here is how the assembly should look at this point.

lines.text: More decoration.
lines.text_raw: More decoration.

lines.text: Materials/tools
lines.text_raw: Materials/tools

lines.text: 1=Rain gutter; 2=Paint (whatever color you prefer!).
lines.text_raw: 1=Rain gutter; 2=Paint (whatever color you prefer!).

lines.text: Cut a length of the rain gutter, and in the bottom of it draw a slot large enough to fit over the top of the blowgun.
lines.text_raw: Cut a length of the rain gutter, and in the bottom of it draw a slot large enough to fit over the top of the blowgun.

lines.text: Now, drill a large hole and finish the slot with a file.
lines.text_raw: Now, drill a large hole and finish the slot with a file.

lines.text: Paint all the parts. When the paint is dry you can assemble everything. Slip the gutter over the blowgun and glue it into place.
lines.text_raw: Paint all the parts. When the paint is dry you can assemble everything. Slip the gutter over the blowgun and glue it into place.

lines.text: The last step is to glue the bottlecap-and-tube assembly on top of the blowgun.
lines.text_raw: The last step is to glue the bottlecap-and-tube assembly on top of the blowgun.

lines.text: The barrel must be aligned with the blowgun, or your new airsoft gun will have very poor accuracy.
lines.text_raw: The barrel must be aligned with the blowgun, or your new airsoft gun will have very poor accuracy.

lines.text: You have finished your airsoft sub-machine gun. The ammo you will need is:
lines.text_raw: You have finished your airsoft sub-machine gun. The ammo you will need is:

lines.text: Airsoft balls;
lines.text_raw: Airsoft balls;

lines.text: Compressed air.
lines.text_raw: Compressed air.

lines.text: This toy is for kids 13 years and older.
lines.text_raw: This toy is for kids 13 years and older.

guide.summary: Make an inexpensive sub-machine airsoft gun.
guide.title: Toy Airsoft Sub-Machine Gun
